---
title: ""  # <--- Empty to allow custom header
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
listing:
  contents: projects.yml
  type: table
  sort: "date desc"
  page-size: 20
  categories: false
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: false
  fields: [date, title, description, stack, code]
  field-display-names:
    date: "Date"
    title: "Project Name"
    description: "Description"
    stack: "Tech Stack"
    code: "Code"
format:
  html:
    css: styles.css
---

<style>
/* --- SECTION 1: HEADER & BADGE STYLES (MATCHING POSTS.QMD) --- */

/* 1. Force reduce the top margin to pull everything up */
.quarto-title-block, .page-columns {
  margin-top: -1.5rem !important; 
  padding-top: 0 !important;
}

/* 2. Badge Style */
.badge-gradient {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #5a9fd4 0%, #3a7fba 100%);
  color: #ffffff;
  padding: 0.5em 1.2em;
  border-radius: 50rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(90, 159, 212, 0.35);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

/* 3. Title Style */
.header-title {
  font-weight: 800;
  color: #5a9fd4; 
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}

/* --- SECTION 2: TABLE STYLES (YOUR CUSTOM CSS) --- */

/* 1. RESET ALL CELLS */
table td {
  font-family: "Lora", serif !important;
  font-size: 16px !important;
  font-weight: 400 !important;
  color: #d0d0d0 !important;
  padding-top: 10px !important;
  padding-bottom: 15px !important;
  vertical-align: top !important;  /* Align everything to the top */
  line-height: 1.6 !important;
}

/* CRITICAL FIX: REMOVE HIDDEN MARGINS */
table td p {
  margin-top: 0 !important;
  margin-bottom: 0 !important;
  padding-top: 0 !important;
}

/* 2. MAKE TITLE BOLD */
table td:nth-child(2) {
  font-weight: 700 !important;
  color: #ffffff !important;
  pointer-events: none !important;
  cursor: text !important;
}

/* 3. STYLE THE GITHUB LINK */
table td:nth-child(5) a {
  color: #5a9fd4 !important;
  font-weight: 600 !important;
  text-decoration: none !important;
}
table td:nth-child(5) a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline !important;
}

/* 4. COLUMN WIDTHS */
table th:nth-child(1), table td:nth-child(1) { width: 15%; white-space: nowrap; } 
table th:nth-child(2), table td:nth-child(2) { width: 22%; } 
table th:nth-child(3), table td:nth-child(3) { width: 38%; } 
table th:nth-child(4), table td:nth-child(4) { width: 15%; font-size: 0.95em; color: #aaa !important; } 
table th:nth-child(5), table td:nth-child(5) { width: 10%; text-align: center; } 

/* 5. HEADER STYLING */
table thead th {
  font-weight: 600 !important;
  color: #fff !important;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #444 !important;
  text-align: left;
}
</style>

<div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mb-2">
  <h1 class="m-0 p-0 header-title" style="font-size: 3rem;">
    My Projects
  </h1>
  <span class="badge-gradient">
    5 Projects
  </span>
</div>

<p style="color: #c0c0c0; font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 300; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; margin-top: 0;">
  A list of my open-source projects and experiments.
</p>
